item.title: Revive Re-weighting in Imbalanced Learning by Density Ratio Estimation
item.description: Revive Re-weighting in Imbalanced Learning by Density Ratio Estimation dynamically adjusts class weights during training using density ratio estimation, significantly improving model generalization, e…
